_comment: Pint configuration for MOTAC IRMS (Integrated Resource Management System)
This file sets code style rules for Laravel/PHP ecosystem using laravel preset as base.
Available presets: laravel, per, psr12, symfony.
This project enforces clean, modern Laravel code style with some customizations for MOTAC Malaysia context.
To use: run `./vendor/bin/pint` or configure in CI/CD.
